title: Storage WG Deputy Lead needed
shortDescription: Joystream Video DAO (https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead to join our [Pioneer Governance App](https://dao.joystream.org) community Storage team.


 Deputy Lead should be willing to learn how to manage Lead's responsibilities, including: 

 - Maximize the Storage WG scores 

 - Ensure that Storage Providers are performing adequately 

 - Ana
lyze current storage capacities utilized within the Storage WG and develop steps and processes to improve and expand upon them 

 - Analyze current storage capacities utilized within the Storage WG and
 develop steps and processes to improve and expand upon them 

 - Prepares weekly reports/plans/summary in a format approved by Council and Jsgenesis

applicationFormQuestions.question: Do you have experience with Linux? If yes, please describe it
Do you have experience with blockchain nodes? If yes, please describe it
Tell us a bit about yourself
Your availability, in hours per day
Do you understand the compensation model?
Tell us a bit more about your experience in IT
